item.title: Risk and Return on Investment in The 10 Biggest Tech Companies in The World & Predictions for The Future
item.description: Overview Evaluate the risk and return of 10 stocks of The World’s Biggest Technology Companies 5 years ago to date based on annual Sharpe Ratios. Create a tool that functions to provide stock price predictions from companies that have the highest annual sharpe ratio evaluation results in previous evaluations. Machine learning with LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) model is used to predict stock prices. All datasets are provided from Yahoo! Finance’s API.
